metadata.title: Update International (SC-25) 2-1/2 oz Stainless Steel Sauce Cup [Set of 12]
description: This sauce cup is constructed of stainless steel. This sauce cup make a much better impression than their plastic counterparts and may be reused rather than simply being thrown away. Comes with 2-1/2-ounce capacity and round shape. Measures 2-1/4-inch diameter.
